page.title: 08Durweston School:Our Time 1
page.content: Most people rode their bikes in their spare time and they rode them often. Also most people enjoyed reading books. 5 people did both. There were 4 people who watched television. 4 people played with another person. We expected that a lot more people would watch television and that less people would play with another person in their spare time. 2 people played football. We expected that there would be more. There were 2 people who swam and 2 people who played on their computer. These are the things only 1 person did: walking dogs, playing cricket, canoeing, Brownies, playing the piano, bird watching, fishing, drawing, and colouring.
